Class ContactDataSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • bootcamp.cst235.crudlab.ContactDataSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class ContactDataSource
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataSource
    Class contains CRUD functions for a VERY basic contact database Implements the DataSource interface

    roy
